name: Far Down We Go
description:
This was the first time I ever made a 2d game but it certainly was very fun,
anyway, it was just a project to test my abilities.
I also worked on this with a friend, so it definitely exceeded my expectations.

This was also a game I made for the mini jam with the theme of depth/depths.

All assets were custom made by me and my friend for this game jam.

The game is inspired by the SpongeBob cartoons and in particular the "King Jellyfish" episode, any other details are up to you to find out.

That being said, have fun playing it.
